} } /** * * Blogger Template Documentation * Name : Blog MUI CSS * Date : 8th August 2017 * Designer : Irfaan Programmer * URL : kodeinblogger.blogspot.com * License : Premium Template v3 * Next Revisiton : Ads in Homepage on Center Looping Article,Author Box, Show Author and Label in Homepage Post,blog-pager, tanggal, author profile */ /*============================================== = BLOGGER STYLE VARIABLE = ==============================================*/ /*===== End of BLOGGER STYLE VARIABLE ======*/ /*============================================== = BLOGGER LAYOUT & COLOR = ==============================================*/ /* LAYOUT */ layout {padding:50px} #layout{min-width:0} #layout #sidedrawer{position:static;width:50%;float:left} #layout #sidedrawer li{display:none} #layout #blogsearch{width:90%; float:left; } #layout #blog-nav-top{float:left; margin:25px; width:50%; } #layout #header-site {display:none} #layout #header{position:static;float:right;width:50%} #layout #main-sidebar{float:right;width:45%} #layout #main-wrapper{float:left;width:55%} #layout #main-ads{overflow:hidden;width:90%;margin:10px auto} #layout #footer{clear:both} /* COLOR */ body{background:$(body.background);color:$(body.text.color)}a:link{color:$(link.color)}a:visited{color:$(link.visited.color)}#header{background:$(header.background.color)}#blog-nav-top button,.sidedrawer-toggle{color:$(header.text.color)}#sidedrawer{background-color:$(sidedrawer.background.color)}#sidedrawer a.block{color:$(sidedrawer.link.color)}.post-outer .post,.post-outer .post .post-title,.post-outer .post-header,.breadcrumb,.post-outer .post-body,#blog-pager,#related-post,.post-author-profile,#comments,#sidebar .widget,.author-bio{background:$(article.background.color)}.post .post-label a,.post .post-comments{color:#fff}.post-outer .post .post-title{color:$(article.title.color)}#footer{background-color:$(footer.background.color)}#footer a{color:$(body.text.color)}#sidedrawer{border-right:1px solid $(sidedrawer.border.color)}#header{border-bottom:1px solid $(header.border.color)}}#footer{border-top:1px solid $(footer.border.color)} /*===== End of BLOGGER LAYOUT & COLOR ======*/ @media(max-width:640px){.mui-container{max-width:95%}#header .mui-container,#footer .mui-container{padding:0 15px}} #content-wrapper .mui-container{padding:0 10px}@media(max-width:544px){#header .mui-container,#footer .mui-container{padding:0 15px;max-width:100%}#content-wrapper .mui-container{max-width:100%;padding:0}#main-wrapper,#main-ads .widget{padding:0!important}#blog-pager,.post-author-inner,.post-author-profile h3,#related-post h3,ul#related-summary,#comments h3,.post-outer .post-body{padding:10px 15px!important}.post-outer .post-body,#comments,#related-post,.comments .comments-content,.post-author-profile,#blog-pager-container{border:none!important;margin:0!important}}@media(min-width:768px){#comments h3,.comments .comments-content,#comments .footer,#commentsHolder,.post-outer .post-body,ul#related-summary,#related-post h3,.post-author-profile h3,.post-author-inner,#blog-pager{padding:20px}} @media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper{display:block!important}#main-sidebar{display:none!important}} #main-wrapper{width:65%;float:left}#main-sidebar{float:right;width:32.5%;}@media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper,#main-sidebar{display:block!important}}@media(max-width:768px){#main-wrapper{float:none;width:100%}#main-sidebar{display:none}#main-sidebar{float:none;width:initial;margin:10px 15px}} @media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper{display:block!important}#main-sidebar{display:none!important}} @media(max-width:768px){#main-wrapper{float:none;width:100%}#main-sidebar{display:none}#main-sidebar{float:none;width:initial;margin:10px 15px}} .images-content figure::before{transition:opacity 0.5s;position:absolute;display:block;content:'';background:rgba(158, 158, 158, 0.29);top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;opacity:0;z-index:1} .post:hover .images-content figure::before {opacity:1} .post-outer-container{width:33.33%;width:calc(100% / 3);float:left}.post-outer-container:nth-child(3n+1){clear:both}.post-outer .post{margin:0 10px 20px 10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb}.post .post-label,.post .post-comments{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;padding:15px;font-size:12px;z-index:1}.post .post-comments{top:initial;bottom:0;padding:3px 15px}.post .snippet-thumbnail{max-height:250px;height:250px;align-items:center;background:#f2f2f2;position:relative}.post .snippet-thumbnail img{position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;width:1px;min-width:100%;height:1px;min-height:100%}.post-outer-container .post-title{font-size:18px;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb;padding:10px;position:relative;max-height:60px}.post .post-body{padding:10px;overflow-wrap:break-word;word-wrap:break-word}.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-height:75px;overflow:hidden}@media(max-width:1024px){.post .snippet-thumbnail{max-height:150px;height:150px}}@media(max-width:960px){.post-outer-container{width:50%;width:calc(100% / 2)}.post-outer-container:nth-child(3n+1){clear:inherit}.post-outer-container:nth-child(2n+1){clear:both}}@media(max-width:768px){.post-outer-container .post-title{font-size:16px}}@media(max-width:640px){.post-outer-container{width:100%}.post-outer .post-body{padding:10px 15px}.post-outer .post{position:relative;margin:0 0 10px 0;box-shadow:0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}.post .post-header{position:static}.post .post-label,.post .post-comments{display:none}.post .snippet-thumbnail img{position:static;width:100px;min-width:initial;height:initial;min-height:initial}.post .snippet-thumbnail{height:auto;position:absolute;right:20px;bottom:25px;width:100px}.post-outer-container .post-title{position:static;padding:10px 15px}.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-width:400px}}@media(max-width:640px){.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-width:380px}.post .snippet-thumbnail{bottom:40px}}@media(max-width:480px){.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-height:65px;max-width:320px;font-size:14px}.post .snippet-thumbnail{width:60px;max-height:60px;bottom:45px}}@media(max-width:428px){.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-width:275px}}@media(max-width:388px){.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-width:230px}}@media(max-width:328px){.post .snippet-thumbnail{display:none}.post .post-snippet.snippet-container{max-width:100%}} .post-outer .post-body{border:1px solid #ebebeb;padding:20px 15px}.post-outer .post-header{text-align:center;padding:10px 30px;border-left:1px solid #ebebeb;border-right:1px solid #ebebeb}.post-outer .post-title{position:static;text-align:center;padding:10px 30px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;font-size:24px;max-height:100%;text-transform:capitalize;font-weight:700}.post-outer .post-label{position:static;padding:0}.post-outer .post-label a{color:initial}.post-body ul,.post-body ol{margin:10px 30px}.post-body ul li{padding:2px}.post-outer .post-footer{clear:both}.post-body img{max-width:100%;height:auto}.post-body .separator a{display:block}.post-body iframe{max-width:100%;max-height:100%}@media(max-width:768px){.post-outer .post-body{font-size:18px}}@media(max-width:544px){.post-outer .post-title{border-bottom:0;padding:10px 15px}.post-outer .post-header{border:0;padding:10px 15px;font-size:10px}.post-outer .post-header-inner{position:relative;display:inline-block}.post-outer .post-header-inner:before{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:-10px;height:1px;width:100%;background:#ebebeb;margin:5px auto}.post-body .separator a{margin:0 0 10px!important;float:none!important}} /* STATIC PAGE */ #main-wrapper{width:auto;float:none}#main-sidebar{display:none}@media(min-width:544px){.mui-container{max-width:420px}}@media(min-width:768px){.mui-container{max-width:540px}}@media(min-width:992px){.mui-container{max-width:720px}}@media(min-width:1200px){.mui-container{max-width:960px}} /* POST LABEL */ .post-label {position:static;padding:0} .post-label a{color:initial} .post-label{margin:10px 0;} .postLabels{display:inline-block} /* POST AUTHOR */ .post-author-profile{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb} .post-author-profile h3{font-size:18px;text-align:left;padding:20px 15px;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb} .post-author-inner {padding:20px 15px;overflow:hidden} .post-author-profile .author-image{float:left;width:15%;margin-right:15px} /* POST REACTION */ .reactions{margin:10px 0;display:block}.reactions iframe{max-height:20px}.reactions iframe .rx-option{float:none} /* POST LOCATION */ .post-location{display:block;background:#fff;margin:10px 0;} /* POST PRE */ pre{background-color:#fafafa;padding:15px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;overflow-x:scroll}@media(max-width:360px){pre{max-height:250px}} /* POST BLOCKQUOTE */ .post-body blockquote{font-size:1.4em;width:60%;margin:50px auto;font-family:Open Sans;font-style:italic;color:#555;padding:1.2em 30px 1.2em 75px;border-left:8px solid #78c0a8;line-height:1.6;position:relative;background:#ededed}.post-body blockquote::before{font-family:Arial;content:"\201C"color:#78c0a8;font-size:4em;position:absolute;left:10px;top:-10px}.post-body blockquote::after{content:''}.post-body blockquote span{display:block;color:#333;font-style:normal;font-weight:bold;margin-top:1em} /* POST TABLE */ .post-body table{width:100%} .post-body table td,.post-body table caption{border:1px solid #ebebeb;padding:10px 15px;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;color:#465158;font-size:.9rem} .post-body table th{color:#ea4880;border:1px solid #ebebeb;padding:10px 15px;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-size:18px} .post-body th{font-weight:700} .post-body table caption{border:none;font-style:italic} .post-body td,.post-body th{vertical-align:top;text-align:left;font-size:13px;padding:3px 5px;border:1px solid #ebebeb} .post-body table tr:nth-child(even) >td{background-color:#f2f2f2} .post-body table.tr-caption-container{width:auto} .post-body table.tr-caption-container td{padding:8px} .post-body table.tr-caption-container td a{margin:0!important} @media (max-width:768px){ .post-body table{display:block;overflow-x:scroll} } /* COMMENTS */ #comments{border:1px solid #ebebeb}#comments h3{padding:20px 15px;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb}#comments ol ol .continue{display:none}.comments .comment-message{margin:5px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none}.comments{clear:both;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0;line-height:1em}.comments .comments-content{padding:20px 15px;font-size:12px;margin-bottom:16px;font-weight:normal;text-align:left;line-height:1.4em}.comments .continue a,.comments .comment .comment-actions a{display:inline;font-size:12px;padding:2px 5px;margin-right:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb}.comments .continue a:active,.comments .comment .comment-actions a:active{position:relative;top:1px}.comments .continue{text-align:center;padding:10px 0}.comments .continue a{padding:10px}.comments .comments-content .comment-thread ol{list-style-type:none;padding:0}.comments .comments-content .inline-thread{padding:.5em 1em 0 1em}.comments .comments-content .comment-thread:empty{display:none}.comments .comments-content .comment:first-child{padding-top:16px}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-top:1em;margin-left:40px;font-size:12px}.comments .comments-content .comment{padding-bottom:8px;margin-bottom:0}.comments .comments-content .comment:last-child{border-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0}.comments .comments-content .comment-body{position:relative}.comments .comments-content .user{font-style:normal;font-weight:bold}.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author{width:18px;height:18px;display:inline-block;margin:0 0 -4px 6px}.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author:before{font-family:fontawesome;content:"\f2be"position:relative;color:#4285f4}.comments .comments-content .datetime{margin-left:6px;font-size:11px;float:right}.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px}.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px;text-align:none;margin:15px 0 15px}.comments .comments-content .owner-actions{position:absolute;right:0;top:0}.comments .comments-replybox{border:0;height:250px;width:100%}.comments .comment-replybox-single{margin-top:5px;margin-left:48px}.comments .comment-replybox-thread{margin-top:5px}.comments .comments-content .loadmore a{display:block;padding:10px 16px;text-align:center}.comments .thread-toggle{cursor:pointer;display:inline-block}.comments .comments-content .loadmore{cursor:pointer;max-height:3em;margin-top:3em}.comments .comments-content .loadmore.loaded{max-height:0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden}.comments .thread-chrome.thread-collapsed{display:none}.comments .thread-toggle{display:inline-block}.comments .thread-toggle .thread-arrow{display:inline-block;height:6px;width:7px;overflow:visible;margin:.3em;padding-right:4px}.comments .thread-expanded .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAc AAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAG0lEQVR42mNgwAfKy8v/48I4FeA0AacVDFQBAP9wJkE/KhUMAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent}.comments .thread-collapsed .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAA AcAAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAJUlEQVR42mNgAILy8vL/DLgASBKnApgkVgXIkhgKiNKJ005s4gDLbCZBiSxfygAAAAB JRU5ErkJggg==") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent}.comments .avatar-image-container{float:left;overflow:hidden}.comments .avatar-image-container img{width:36px}.comments .comment-block{margin-left:48px;position:relative;padding:15px 20px 15px 20px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;overflow:hidden;border-image:initial}@media(max-width:768px){#comments .footer,#commentsHolder{padding:20px 15px!important}}@media(max-width:480px){.comments .comments-content .datetime{float:none;display:block;margin:0}.comments .comment-header{max-height:30px;overflow:hidden}.comments .comments-content .comment{position:relative}.comments .avatar-image-container{position:absolute;right:0;z-index:1;margin:2px}.comments .comment-block{margin-left:0}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-left:15px}} .blog-pager-newer-link{float:left} .blog-pager-older-link{float:right} .home-link{} #blog-pager{text-align:center;clear:both} .blog-pager-older-link{float:none} .search-mobile {margin:0; padding:10px 15px; background:#fff; } /* PAGINATION POST */ #blog-pager-container{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb}#blog-pager{display:block;padding:20px 15px;overflow:hidden}#blog-pager .blog-pager-kiri{float:left;width:50%;text-align:left}#blog-pager .blog-pager-kanan{float:right;width:50%;display:block;text-align:right}#blog-pager-container .pager-border{position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb}#blog-pager-container .pager-border:after{content:""background-color:#4285f4;left:0;width:35%;height:2px;bottom:-2px;position:absolute}     • function togglemain() { var x = document.getElementById('main-wrapper'); var y = document.getElementById('main-sidebar'); var zz = document.getElementById('togglemain'); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; y.style.display = 'none'; zz.innerHTML =""; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; y.style.display = 'block'; window.scrollTo(0, 0); zz.innerHTML = ""; } }
    Blog MUI CSS

    Blogger template style made with mui css framework, enjoy write to future

Homepage More Article artikelterkait(); More Article artikelterkaitinner(); BLOG_CMT_createIframe(''); (function() { var items = ; var msgs = ; var config = ; // document.getElementById("comments").style.display = "block"; var cursor=null;if(items&&items.length>0){cursor=parseInt(items[items.length-1].timestamp)+1} var bodyFromEntry=function(entry){if(entry.gd$extendedProperty){for(var k in entry.gd$extendedProperty){if(entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name=='blogger.contentRemoved'){return ''+entry.content.$t+''}}} return entry.content.$t} var parse=function(data){cursor=null;var comments=[];if(data&&data.feed&&data.feed.entry){for(var i=0,entry;entry=data.feed.entry[i];i++){var comment={};var id=/blog-(\d+).post-(\d+)/.exec(entry.id.$t);comment.id=id?id[2]:null;comment.body=bodyFromEntry(entry);comment.timestamp=Date.parse(entry.published.$t)+'';if(entry.author&&entry.author.constructor===Array){var auth=entry.author[0];if(auth){comment.author={name:(auth.name?auth.name.$t:undefined),profileUrl:(auth.uri?auth.uri.$t:undefined),avatarUrl:(auth.gd$image?auth.gd$image.src:undefined)}}} if(entry.link){if(entry.link[2]){comment.link=comment.permalink=entry.link[2].href} if(entry.link[3]){var pid=/.*comments\/default\/(\d+)\?.*/.exec(entry.link[3].href);if(pid&&pid[1]){comment.parentId=pid[1]}}} comment.deleteclass='item-control blog-admin';if(entry.gd$extendedProperty){for(var k in entry.gd$extendedProperty){if(entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name=='blogger.itemClass'){comment.deleteclass+=' '+entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value}else if(entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name=='blogger.displayTime'){comment.displayTime=entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value}}} comments.push(comment)}} return comments};var paginator=function(callback){if(hasMore()){var url=config.feed+'?alt=json&v=2&orderby=published&reverse=false&max-results=50';if(cursor){url+='&published-min='+new Date(cursor).toISOString()} window.bloggercomments=function(data){var parsed=parse(data);cursor=parsed.length<50?null:parseInt(parsed[parsed.length-1].timestamp)+1 callback(parsed);window.bloggercomments=null} url+='&callback=bloggercomments';var script=document.createElement('script');script.type='text/javascript';script.src=url;document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script)}};var hasMore=function(){return!!cursor};var getMeta=function(key,comment){if('iswriter'==key){var matches=!!comment.author&&comment.author.name==config.authorName&&comment.author.profileUrl==config.authorUrl;return matches?'true':''}else if('deletelink'==key){return config.baseUri+'/delete-comment.g?blogID='+config.blogId+'&postID='+comment.id}else if('deleteclass'==key){return comment.deleteclass} return ''};var replybox=null;var replyUrlParts=null;var replyParent=undefined;var onReply=function(commentId,domId){if(replybox==null){replybox=document.getElementById('comment-editor');if(replybox!=null){replybox.height='250px';replybox.style.display='block';replyUrlParts=replybox.src.split('#')}} if(replybox&&(commentId!==replyParent)){document.getElementById(domId).insertBefore(replybox.parentNode,null);replybox.src=replyUrlParts[0]+(commentId?'&parentID='+commentId:'')+'#'+replyUrlParts[1];replyParent=commentId}};var hash=(window.location.hash||'#').substring(1);var startThread,targetComment;if(/^comment-form_/.test(hash)){startThread=hash.substring('comment-form_'.length)}else if(/^c[0-9]+$/.test(hash)){targetComment=hash.substring(1)} var configJso={'maxDepth':config.maxThreadDepth};var
